message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me!
Let's be realistic, Alice. I make the first real offer.
I think we can both do better than your last offer, Bob. Let's split it closer to 55/45, I'll take the slightly larger share this time.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us.
We're getting close to the end, Bob. Let's compromise a bit more. I'll take a slightly smaller share this time, and we can both get something.
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it.
